snippet: The missile defense agencies of Israel and the United States carried out a second test of the advanced Arrow 3 antiballistic missile system on Friday, Israel’s Defense Ministry said in a statement.
lead_paragraph: The missile defense agencies of Israel and the United States carried out a second test of the advanced Arrow 3 antiballistic missile system on Friday, Israel’s Defense Ministry said in a statement.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
